entries.title: Block A moderation and ingest controls
entries.summary: Implemented persistent instance/channel moderation, denylist-aware sync/updater/crawler filtering, strict JoinPeerTube sync mode, and a dedicated end-to-end Block A regression test on fixture databases.

entries.title: Changelog unread badge and new/seen split
entries.summary: Added an unread dot on Changelog navigation links across pages and a visual separator between new and previously seen updates on the changelog page.

entries.title: Changelog page added
entries.summary: Added a dedicated static Changelog page that loads updates from the repository and shows them in a readable newest-first format.

entries.title: Public changelog source introduced
entries.summary: Created a human-readable changelog data file to present completed work in plain language for users.

entries.title: Recovery after rollback completed
entries.summary: Restored worker, crawler, jobs, and documentation after lost edits and revalidated the recovered flow.

entries.title: Staging updater worker delivered
entries.summary: Implemented a staging-based background updater pipeline with merge, service integration, and smoke testing.

entries.title: Channels page performance improved
entries.summary: Moved channels filtering and pagination to the server and optimized DB queries for faster browsing.

entries.title: Similar video timing logs added
entries.summary: Added timing logs for video-page similar requests to make performance bottlenecks visible.

entries.title: Video card duration on similar list
entries.summary: Added duration labels to similar-video cards on the video page.

entries.title: Exploit cache seed lookup optimized
entries.summary: Reduced exploit latency by improving seed lookups, batching DB access, and handling partial cache entries.

entries.title: Docker deployment support
entries.summary: Added Docker and docker-compose support for running the backend with SQLite volume persistence.

entries.title: Handler contracts and config cleanup
entries.summary: Polished handlers and removed duplicated config paths for a cleaner server structure.

entries.title: Server module decomposition
entries.summary: Refactored server.py into focused handler and utility modules to improve maintainability.

entries.title: API rate limiting enabled
entries.summary: Added in-memory request rate limiting with 429 responses and trigger logging.

entries.title: Browser-local likes mode
entries.summary: Added temporary local likes storage in the browser and sent likes to server recommendations.

entries.title: Fresh videos selection improved
entries.summary: Updated fresh-video logic for both guest and liked profiles with better distribution in feed output.

entries.title: Recommendation builder extracted
entries.summary: Moved recommendation strategy assembly out of server.py into a dedicated builder module.

entries.title: Unified similarity candidates pipeline
entries.summary: Centralized similarity candidate and cache logic so home and video-page flows use the same core path.

entries.title: Guest recommendation profiles
entries.summary: Added automatic guest profiles for users without likes, with explicit profile switching.

entries.title: Recommendation serving speed pass
entries.summary: Materialized popularity in DB, added index support, and introduced popularity recompute tooling.

entries.title: Popular freshness bonus
entries.summary: Adjusted popular ranking with a soft freshness component so old content does not dominate completely.

entries.title: Filtered random cache mode
entries.summary: Added optional random-cache mode that fills cache with filtering already applied.

entries.title: Random cache per-instance and per-author limits
entries.summary: Added limits to keep random results more diverse across instances and channels.

entries.title: Database build documentation
entries.summary: Documented crawler/job pipeline for collecting data, building embeddings, and creating FAISS indexes.

entries.title: Random and popular layers for no-likes mode
entries.summary: Introduced dedicated random and popular layers and clarified fallback behavior when likes are missing.

entries.title: Per-instance output cap
entries.summary: Added per-instance limit in recommendation post-filters to prevent one host from dominating output.

entries.title: Exploit and explore randomization
entries.summary: Added pool-based randomization to reduce repeated recommendation lists from stable sources.

entries.title: Layer config simplification
entries.summary: Removed count override and split gather ratio from mix ratio for clearer recommendation control.

entries.title: Independent explore, exploit, and fresh layers
entries.summary: Separated recommendation layers and treated likes as a mechanism inside generators.

entries.title: Per-author cap in batch
entries.summary: Limited number of videos per author in each batch to improve diversity.

entries.title: Continuous freshness scoring
entries.summary: Switched freshness to a continuous decay-based score instead of a hard threshold.

entries.title: Exploration versus exploitation split
entries.summary: Added explicit explore and exploit behavior to balance discovery and safe recommendations.

entries.title: Home and Up Next profile split
entries.summary: Separated recommendation profiles for home feed and video up-next contexts.

entries.title: Feature-based recommendation scoring
entries.summary: Introduced configurable feature scoring for candidates instead of relying on shuffle.

entries.title: Pre-mixer scoring stage
entries.summary: Added an explicit scoring stage before mixing so candidates share a comparable utility score.
